title: MCSA/MCSE: Windows 2003 Upgrade Study Guide (70-292 and 70-296)
features: Here's the book you need to prepare for Exams 70-292 and 70-296. This Study Guide provides:
In-depth coverage of every exam objective
In-depth coverage of every exam objective
Practical information on planning, implementing, and maintaining a Windows Server 2003 Environment

About the Author
Lisa Donald
, MCT, MCSE, has worked with numerous Fortune 500 companies, including DEC and Apple.
Anil Desai
, MCSE, MCSD, MCDBA, is a regular contributor to Microsoft Certified Professional magazine.
Suzan Sage London
, MCSE, works in Silicon Valley and for Fortune 500 clients nationwide.
James Chellis
, MCSE and MCT, is CEO of EdgeTek Education, a Microsoft Certified Solution Provider.
Matthew Sheltz
, MCP, is a software engineer and systems administrator for EdgeTek Education.

author: {'avatar': 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/61ASsYgCwBL._SY600_.png', 'name': 'Anil Desai', 'about': ["Anil Desai is an independent consultant based in Austin, TX. He specializes in evaluating, implementing, and managing IT solutions. He has worked extensively with Microsoft's Server products and the .NET / SQL Server development platforms. Anil is an MCSE, MCSD, MCDBA, MCITP, and a Microsoft MVP (Windows Server - Virtualization).", 'Anil is the author of numerous technical books focusing on the Windows Server Platform, Virtualization, Active Directory, SQL Server, and IT management. He has made dozens of conference presentations at national events and is also a contributor to technical magazines. For more information, please see http://AnilDesai.net, or e-mail Anil@AnilDesai.net.']}
